{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2804WBR |revision=v1 |upc=662698575682 |ean= |asin=B00009APTT |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/07/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG4005-17 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDWG4005ACC |ic_id=3857A-WG4005AC |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C2510A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC2M32B2TG-6F |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Accton WN4401 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3680 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=SMC |default_ssid_regex=^SMC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass=smcadmin |oui=00:04:E2 |oui_eth=00:04:E2 }} [http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&localeCode=EN_USA&cid=1&scid=4&pid=544 Product page]
[http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/smc2804wbr/ On the HRI website]
Sub-Assy Number: 720.9915, Supplier P/N: 750.9915
"P/N:141400520001E REV:01" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the main board for the router populating this entry (S/N: T131600953). :"P/N:14144011000E" and "REV:R01" is silkscreened on the Mini PCI wireless module. :Additional part information... ::The CPU is part S3C2510A01. ::The wireless module is using ISL3880IK (MAC/BB) and an ISL3680IR RF transceiver ([http://isl3893.sourceforge.net/download/datasheets/ISL3680.pdf datasheet on '''isl3893.sourceforge.net''']). ::The board is using '''Wendell''', '''W.D.''', and '''Gloria''' capacitors.
The default SSID is '''SMC'''.
The power adapter included with the device appears to have been a '''DVE''' DV-91A (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 16W -> 9VDC, 1000mA).
There also appears to be a ISL3893 version (FCC ID: HED2804WBR, per [http://isl3893.sourceforge.net/hardware.html isl3893.sourceforge.net], this is v2).
